Package org.training.foodorderapplication.config

Class SecurityConfig

java.lang.Object
org.training.foodorderapplication.config.SecurityConfig
@Configuration @EnableWebSecurity @EnableGlobalMethodSecurity(prePostEnabled=true) public class SecurityConfig extends Object
The SecurityConfig class provides the security configuration for the application. It includes configuration for the authentication manager, password encoder, JWT authentication filter, access denied handler, and the security filter chain. This class is used to configure the security settings for the application, including the authentication manager used to authenticate users, the password encoder used to encode passwords, the JWT authentication filter used to authenticate JWT tokens, and the access denied handler used to handle access denied exceptions. The class also configures the security filter chain for the application, which specifies the security settings for different URLs. This class is annotated with @Configuration, indicating that it is a configuration class.
